name: Social Distance (Shancer)
description:
You're always under social contact, direct or indirect. 

Sadly i run out of time and couldn't make the Game i wanted it to be, because of private life. 

And its my first Game ever, its totally crap and because i totally run out of time I made a little Game in. 

I mostly copied from Zigurous (Link:

That's for the awesome work you done.

Lets hope for a better Game Jam next time.

Have fun play other games and rate them good!

Thanks to my good friend, BlueVolt, for the awesome help.

Check out his totally nailed game 'Sqaure Hunt'.

https://blue-volt.itch.io/square-hunt

Stay motivated, stay safe.

Take care of your self, dont forget your loved ones and also dont forget.. YOU ARE NEVER ALONE!
